#define SOT_CALL_SIG (   sotName,
  sotType 
)
Value:
boost::bind(&Signal<sotType,int>::access, \
        &sotName,_2)
#define SOT_INIT_SIGNAL_1 (   sotFunction,
  sotArg1,
  sotArg1Type 
)
Value:
boost::bind(&sotFunction,                          \
      SOT_CALL_SIG(sotArg1,sotArg1Type),_1), \
  sotArg1
